segments.text: I notice the water overflowing from the sink and it's making me feel a bit disgusted.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman just keeps drying dishes, not noticing the mess.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The children are being so sneaky, taking cookies without her knowing.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think the boy is going to get into trouble, climbing on that stool like that.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl seems to be encouraging him, waiting for a cookie with her hand outstretched.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel like someone needs to clean up that water before it causes a bigger mess.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The floor is getting more and more slippery with all that water.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I'm surprised the woman hasn't slipped already, it looks so unsafe.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The garden outside looks so peaceful, it's almost ironic compared to the chaos inside.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I really hope the woman notices what's going on soon and cleans up that water.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't stand looking at that puddle of water on the floor, it's so unpleasant.
segments.speaker: PAR
